title: Multi-Domain Route Deconfliction
description: A planner must deconflict a mission that involves a satellite pass, a high-altitude reconnaissance aircraft, and a ground patrol all operating in the same area at the same time.

tasks.description: Input the operational tracks and timings for the satellite, aircraft, and ground patrol.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner accurately enters all data for the multi-domain operation.

tasks.description: Run a 4D (space, time) deconfliction analysis to identify any potential conflicts.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool identifies that the aircraft's flight path conflicts with the satellite's imaging swath at the required time.

tasks.description: Adjust the timing of the aircraft's flight to ensure it does not enter the satellite's field of view during the imaging pass.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner resolves the conflict by adjusting the timeline, allowing all assets to complete their missions.
